form.label: Audit logs
form.description: This dashboard is used to monitor audit logs from scripts

panel.title: Audit logs : Modular input regarding Zscaler API (Inputs)

search.query: index=_internal source="*ta_zscaler_api_zscaler_zpa_configurations.log" | rex field="_raw" "^\d+\-\d+\-\d+ \d+:\d+:\d+,\d+ (?<level>[^ ]+) pid=\d+ tid=[^ ]+ file=[^ ]+ \| (?<signature>.*)" | sort 0 -_time | table _time pid level signature | rename pid as PID, level as Level, signature as "Signature"

panel.title: Audit logs : Modular alerts regarding Zscaler API (Custom Alert Action)

search.query: index=cim_modactions sourcetype="modular_alerts:*" app="TA-zscaler-api" | rex field=_raw "^\d+\-\d+\-\d+ \d+:\d+:\d+,\d+ (?<level>[^ ]+)" | rex field=source "(?<file>[^\\\\]+)$" | eval signature = coalesce(signature,_raw) | sort 0 -_time | table _time file user sid level signature | rename file as "File", user as "User", sid as "SID", level as "Level", signature as "Signature"
